00049 {

00051         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_OBSTACLEIMAGE, m_image);

00054         DDX_Radio(pDX, IDC_CUBOID, m_obstacleType);

00063 BOOL ObstacleDialog::OnSetActive() {
00064         CPropertyPage::OnSetActive();
00065         ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_CUBOID))->SetBitmap(::LoadBitmap(AfxGetApp()->m_hInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDB_CUBOID)));
00066         ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_POLYHEDRON))->SetBitmap(::LoadBitmap(AfxGetApp()->m_hInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDB_POLYHEDRON)));
00067         ((CButton*)GetDlgItem(IDC_CYLINDER))->SetBitmap(::LoadBitmap(AfxGetApp()->m_hInstance, MAKEINTRESOURCE(IDB_CYLINDER)));
00068         return m_image.Initialize(doc);
00069 }
00070 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 bool ObstacleDialog::Initialize() {
00072         if (!m_image.Initialize(doc))
00073                 return false;
00074         return true;
00075 }

00077 void ObstacleDialog::DeInitialize() {
00078         m_image.m_stage = POINT1;
00079         m_obstacleType = 0;
00080         m_viewType = OBSTACLE_FRAME_VIEW;
00081         obstacle.RemoveAll();
00082 }
00083 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 void ObstacleDialog::OnVScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00085 {
00086         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00087         int minpos;
00088         int maxpos;
00089         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00090         SCROLLINFO   info;
00091     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00092         switch (nSBCode)
00093     {
00094                 case SB_TOP:      
00095                         curpos = minpos;
00096                         break;
00097                 case SB_BOTTOM:     
00098                         curpos = maxpos;
00099                         break;
00100                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00101                         break;
00102                 case SB_LINEUP:      
00103                         if (curpos > minpos)
00104                                 curpos--;
00105                         break;
00106                 case SB_LINEDOWN:   
00107                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00108                                 curpos++;
00109                         break;
00110                 case SB_PAGEUP:    
00111                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00112                         break;
00113                 case SB_PAGEDOWN:
00114                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00115                         break;
00116                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00117                         curpos = nPos;     
00118                         break;
00119                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00120                         curpos = nPos;     
00121                         break;
00122     }    
00123         offsety = curpos;
00124         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00125         m_image.Invalidate();
00126     CDialog::OnVScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00127 }
00128 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 void ObstacleDialog::OnHScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00130 {
00131         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00132         int minpos;
00133         int maxpos;
00134         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00135         SCROLLINFO   info;
00136     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00137         switch (nSBCode)
00138     {
00139                 case SB_LEFT:      
00140                         curpos = minpos;
00141                         break;
00142                 case SB_RIGHT:     
00143                         curpos = maxpos;
00144                         break;
00145                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00146                         break;
00147                 case SB_LINELEFT:      
00148                         if (curpos > minpos)
00149                                 curpos--;
00150                         break;
00151                 case SB_LINERIGHT:   
00152                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00153                                 curpos++;
00154                         break;
00155                 case SB_PAGELEFT:    
00156                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00157                         break;
00158                 case SB_PAGERIGHT:
00159                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00160                         break;
00161                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00162                         curpos = nPos;     
00163                         break;
00164                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00165                         curpos = nPos;     
00166                         break;
00167     }    
00168         offsetx = curpos; 
00169         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00170         m_image.Invalidate();
00171         CDialog::OnHScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00172 }

00186 // --------------------- CObstacleControl class ---------------------------
00187 bool CObstacleControl::Initialize(CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00188         m_stage = POINT1;
00189         m_holding = false;
00190         m_current = -1;
00191 
00192         // Show scroll bars
00193         if (m_hWnd) {
00194                 ObstacleDialog* tab = (ObstacleDialog*)GetParent();
00195                 switch (tab->m_viewType) {
00196                         case OBSTACLE_FRAME_VIEW:
00197                                 image.Destroy();
00198                                 image.CopyOf(imgFrame);
00199                                 break;
00200                         case OBSTACLE_FLOOR_VIEW:
00201                                 image.Destroy();
00202                                 image.CopyOf(floorImg);
00203                                 cvZero(image.GetImage());
00204                                 tab->doc->floormodel.Draw(image.GetImage());
00205                 }
00206                 CRect r; this->GetWindowRect(&r);
00207                 SCROLLINFO horz;
00208                 horz.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00209                 horz.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00210                 horz.nPage = 50;
00211                 horz.nMin = 0;
00212                 horz.nMax = image.Width()-r.Width()+horz.nPage;
00213                 horz.nPos = 0;
00214                 horz.nTrackPos = 0;
00215                 tab->m_hbar.SetScrollInfo(&horz);
00216                 SCROLLINFO vert;
00217                 vert.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00218                 vert.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00219                 vert.nPage = 50;
00220                 vert.nMin = 0;
00221                 vert.nMax = image.Height()-r.Height()+vert.nPage;
00222                 vert.nPos = 0;
00223                 vert.nTrackPos = 0;
00224                 tab->m_vbar.SetScrollInfo(&vert);
00225                 tab->m_vbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Vertical Scroll Bar
00226                 tab->m_hbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Horizontal Scroll Bar
00227                 tab->offsetx = 0; tab->offsety = 0;
00228                 this->Invalidate();
00229         }
00230         return true;
00231 }

00236 Object3D* ObstacleDialog::CreateNewObstacle(CvPoint2D32f point) {
00237         switch (m_obstacleType) {
00238                 case CUBOID: 
00239                         return new Cuboid(point, doc);
00240                 case POLYHEDRON:
00241                         //return new Polyhedron(point, doc);
00242                         return NULL;
00243                 case CYLINDER:
00244                         return new Cylinder(point, doc);
00245                 default:
00246                         return NULL;
00247         }
00248         
00249 }
00250 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00251 void CObstacleControl::DrawItem(LPDRAWITEMSTRUCT lpDrawItemStruct) {
00252         CDC* pDC = CDC::FromHandle(lpDrawItemStruct->hDC);
00253         ObstacleDialog* dlg=(ObstacleDialog*)this->GetParent();
00254         image.Show(pDC->m_hDC, 0, 0, image.Width(), image.Height(), dlg->offsetx, dlg->offsety);
00255         CPen bNew(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(0, 0, 255));
00256         switch (dlg->m_viewType) {
00257                 case OBSTACLE_FRAME_VIEW:
00258                         for (int i=0;i<dlg->obstacle.GetCount();i++) {
00259                                 dlg->obstacle[i]->DrawFrame(pDC, dlg->offsetx, dlg->offsety, &bNew);
00260                         }
00261                         if (m_holding && m_current != -1) {
00262                                 CvPoint3D32f p3 = dlg->obstacle[m_current]->GetCenter();
00263                                 CvPoint point = cvPointFrom32f(dlg->doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(p3));
00264                                 //CRect rToolTip(CPoint(point.x-70-dlg->offsetx, point.y-16-dlg->offsety), CSize(70, 16));
00265                                 CRect rToolTip(CPoint(point.x-70-dlg->offsetx, point.y-16-dlg->offsety), CSize(140, 16));
00266                                 double ddd = dlg->doc->cameramodel.coordsDistanceFromCamera(p3);
00267                                 CString text;text.Format("x=%-.0f y=%-.0f z=%-.0f", p3.x, p3.y, p3.z);
00268                                 drawStaticToolTip(pDC, text, rToolTip);
00269                         }
00270                         break;
00271                 case OBSTACLE_FLOOR_VIEW:
00272                         for (int i=0;i<dlg->obstacle.GetCount();i++) {
00273                                 dlg->obstacle[i]->DrawFloor(pDC, dlg->offsetx, dlg->offsety, &bNew);
00274                         }
00275         }
00276 }
00277 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00278 void CObstacleControl::OnMButtonDown(UINT nFlags, CPoint point) {
00279         OnLButtonDown(nFlags, point);
00280 }
00281 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00282 void CObstacleControl::OnRButtonDown(UINT nFlags, CPoint point) {
00283         OnLButtonDown(nFlags, point);
00284 }
00285 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00286 void CObstacleControl::OnLButtonDown(UINT nFlags, CPoint point) {
00287         CWnd::OnLButtonDown(nFlags, point);
00288         ObstacleDialog* dlg=((ObstacleDialog*)this->GetParent());
00289         CPoint off = CPoint(dlg->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), dlg->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00290         point += off;
00291         switch (dlg->m_viewType) {
00292                 case OBSTACLE_FRAME_VIEW: {
00293                         switch (m_stage) {
00294                                 case POINT1: {
00295                                         RESTART:
00296                                         int match = PointInDotFrame(point, m_pcurrent);
00297                                         if (match != -1) {
00298                                                 m_current = match;
00299                                                 m_holding = true;
00300                                         }
00301                                         else {
00302                                                 Object3D* obst = dlg->CreateNewObstacle(cvPoint2D32f(point));
00303                                                 dlg->obstacle.Add(obst);
00304                                                 m_current = dlg->obstacle.GetCount()-1;
00305                                         }
00306                                         break;
00307                                 }
00308                                 case POINT2: {
00309                                         if (!dlg->obstacle[m_current]->Move2(cvPoint2D32f(point))) {
00310                                                 m_stage = POINT1;
00311                                                 goto RESTART;
00312                                         }
00313                                         break;
00314                                 }
00315                                 case POINT3: {
00316                                         if (!dlg->obstacle[m_current]->Move3(cvPoint2D32f(point))) {
00317                                                 m_stage = POINT1;
00318                                                 goto RESTART;
00319                                         }
00320                                         break;
00321                                 }
00322                                 case POINT4: {
00323                                         if (!dlg->obstacle[m_current]->Move4(cvPoint2D32f(point))) {
00324                                                 m_stage = POINT1;
00325                                                 goto RESTART;
00326                                         }
00327                                 }
00328                         }
00329                 }
00330                 break;
00331                 case OBSTACLE_FLOOR_VIEW: {
00332                         if (m_stage == POINT1) {// move existing obstacles only!
00333                                 int match = PointInDotFloor(point, m_pcurrent);
00334                                 if (match != -1) {
00335                                         m_current = match;
00336                                         m_holding = true;
00337                                 }
00338                         }
00339                 }
00340         }
00341         Invalidate();
00342         UpdateWindow();
00343 }
00344 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00345 void CObstacleControl::OnLButtonDblClk(UINT nFlags, CPoint point) {
00346         // prompt for label
00347         ObstacleDialog* tab = (ObstacleDialog*)GetParent();
00348         CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00349         point += off;
00350         int match = PointInDotFrame(point, m_pcurrent);
00351         if (match != -1 && m_stage == POINT1) {
00352                 point -= off;
00353                 drawEditableToolTip(this, tab->obstacle[match]->label, CRect(point, CSize(80,16)));                                                             
00354                 m_stage = POINT1;
00355                 m_current = -1;
00356         }
00357         else {
00358                 tab->obstacle.RemoveAt(tab->obstacle.GetCount()-1);
00359                 m_stage = POINT1;
00360                 m_current = -1;
00361         }
00362 }
00363 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00364 void CObstacleControl::OnMouseMove(UINT nFlags, CPoint point) {
00365         CWnd::OnMouseMove(nFlags, point);
00366         if (m_current == -1)
00367                 return;
00368         ObstacleDialog* tab = (ObstacleDialog*)GetParent();
00369         CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00370         point += off;
00371         switch (tab->m_viewType) {
00372                 case OBSTACLE_FRAME_VIEW: {
00373                                 if (m_holding) {
00374                                         // move obstacle
00375                                         double diffX = 0, diffY = 0, diffZ = 0;
00376                                         if (nFlags & MK_LBUTTON)
00377                                                 diffX = tab->doc->cameramodel.computeX(cvPoint2D32f(point), m_pcurrent) - m_pcurrent.x;
00378                                         else if (nFlags & MK_MBUTTON)
00379                                                 diffY = tab->doc->cameramodel.computeY(cvPoint2D32f(point), m_pcurrent) - m_pcurrent.y;
00380                                         else if (nFlags & MK_RBUTTON)
00381                                                 diffZ = tab->doc->cameramodel.computeZ(cvPoint2D32f(point), m_pcurrent) - m_pcurrent.z;
00382                                         tab->obstacle[m_current]->Move(cvPoint3D32f((float)diffX, diffY, diffZ));
00383                                         m_pcurrent.x += (float)diffX; m_pcurrent.y += (float)diffY; m_pcurrent.z += (float)diffZ;
00384                                 }
00385                                 else if (nFlags & MK_LBUTTON) {
00386                                         switch (m_stage) {
00387                                                 case POINT1: {
00388                                                         tab->obstacle[m_current]->Move1(cvPoint2D32f(point));
00389                                                         break;
00390                                                 }
00391                                                 case POINT2: {
00392                                                         tab->obstacle[m_current]->Move2(cvPoint2D32f(point));
00393                                                         break;
00394                                                 }
00395                                                 case POINT3: {
00396                                                         tab->obstacle[m_current]->Move3(cvPoint2D32f(point));
00397                                                         break;
00398                                                 }
00399                                                 case POINT4: {
00400                                                         tab->obstacle[m_current]->Move4(cvPoint2D32f(point));
00401                                                 }
00402                                         }
00403                                 }
00404                 }
00405                 break;
00406                 case OBSTACLE_FLOOR_VIEW: {
00407                         if (m_holding) {
00408                                 // move obstacle in XY-plane
00409                                 CvPoint3D32f p3 = tab->doc->floormodel.coordsFloor2Real(cvPoint(point));
00410                                 double dx = p3.x-m_pcurrent.x;
00411                                 double dy = p3.y-m_pcurrent.y;
00412                                 tab->obstacle[m_current]->Move(cvPoint3D32f((float)dx, (float)dy, 0));
00413                                 m_pcurrent = p3;
00414                         }
00415                  }
00416         }
00417         Invalidate();
00418         UpdateWindow();
00419 }
00420 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00421 void CObstacleControl::OnLButtonUp(UINT nFlags, CPoint point) {
00422         CWnd::OnLButtonUp(nFlags, point);
00423         if (m_holding) {
00424                 m_holding = false;
00425                 m_current = -1;
00426                 return;
00427         }
00428         if (m_current == -1)
00429                 return;
00430 
00431         switch (m_stage) {
00432                 case POINT1: {
00433                         m_stage = POINT2;
00434                         break;
00435                 }
00436                 case POINT2: {
00437                         m_stage = POINT3;
00438                         break;
00439                 }
00440                 case POINT3: {
00441                         m_stage = POINT4;
00442                         break;
00443                 }
00444                 case POINT4: {
00445                         m_stage = POINT1;
00446                         m_current = -1;
00447                 }
00448         }
00449         Invalidate();
00450         UpdateWindow();
00451 }
00452 void CObstacleControl::OnMButtonUp(UINT nFlags, CPoint point) {
00453         OnLButtonUp(nFlags, point);
00454 }

00461 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00462 void CObstacleControl::OnKeyDown(UINT nChar, UINT nRepCnt,      UINT nFlags) {
00463         CWnd::OnKeyDown(nChar, nRepCnt, nFlags);
00464         if (nChar == VK_DELETE && m_current != -1) {
00465                 ObstacleDialog* tab = (ObstacleDialog*)GetParent();
00466                 tab->obstacle.RemoveAt(m_current);
00467                 m_current = -1;
00468                 m_stage = POINT1;
00469                 Invalidate();
00470                 UpdateWindow();
00471         }
00472 }
00473 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00474 int CObstacleControl::PointInDotFrame(CPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent) {
00475         ObstacleDialog* tab = (ObstacleDialog*)GetParent();
00476         for (int i=0;i<tab->obstacle.GetCount();i++) {
00477                 if (tab->obstacle[i]->IsFramePointIn(cvPoint(point), pcurrent)) {
00478                         Invalidate();
00479                         UpdateWindow();
00480                         return i; // return the index of the match found
00481                 }
00482         }
00483         return -1; // no match found
00484 }
00485 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00486 int CObstacleControl::PointInDotFloor(CPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent) {
00487         ObstacleDialog* tab = (ObstacleDialog*)GetParent();
00488         for (int i=0;i<tab->obstacle.GetCount();i++) {
00489                 if (tab->obstacle[i]->IsFloorPointIn(cvPoint(point), pcurrent)) {
00490                         Invalidate();
00491                         UpdateWindow();
00492                         return i; // return the index of the match found
00493                 }
00494         }
00495         return -1; // no match found
00496 }
